Articles.Content: I have camera sensitivity set to max in the options, but that's not enough. I like my mouse to be very sensitive. Is there any way to make the cam even more sensitive than it is possible in settings? Maybe via some file editing?

Yes, you can go into your settings.cfg file and search for the appropriate CAMERA setting (there are many, so it depends on which one you want to set). The settings.cfg file is pretty easy to read. Just make sure you edit it with a plain text editor (such as notepad) and nothing that has formatting options (such as word or wordpad).

Many of the settings in settings.cfg have maximum and minimum values when you adjust them in game. However, you can override a lot of those settings by manually editing the file. Just be aware that if you ever go into the settings page ingame, it will reset any values that are outside the min/max allowed and you'll have to manually edit the .cfg again.

(And be prepared for possible strange results.)

Cheers,

~Claw
